title: Israel - Hamas War : Are You Wiser Than The Saudis , The Emirates , and the Bahrainis ? ( Part 3 ) - By Joe Dauda
body_text:
Article of Faith
Israel-Hamas War: Are You Wiser Than The Saudis, The Emirates, and the Bahrainis? (Part 3) -By Joe Dauda
To further prove that this war is going to be after the Holocaust (during which Adolf Hitler killed millions of Jews) note the following statement in Ezekiel’s prophecy and stand in awe at the wisdom of God, never forgetting that the Book of Ezekiel was written between 595BC and 574BC. In fact, if you check the top of the margin of your King James Version of the Bible, you will see that both Ezekiel 38 and 39 were written in 587BC.
Who would be the greatest loser if Israel signs a peace deal with Saudi Arabia?
Iran.
Who is the major financier of Hamas?
Iran.
Who did Thailand negotiate with in order to release their hostages kidnapped from Israel on the 7th of October Hamas?
Iran.
Why?
Because they know who the puppet master is.
And who is the puppet master of Hamas?
Iran.
Why has the relationship between Israel and the Saudis warmed up in recent years?
Iran.
Which country has publicly stated its intention to wipe Israel off the map?
Iran.
Which country did the Bible mention by name as one of those that will join in the invasion of Israel in the end times?
Iran.
Over 2500 years ago, our omniscient God led prophet Ezekiel to prophesy that, after the regathering of the children of Israel back into their land, an invasion would take place. Bible students believe that the leader of this invasion is Russia. But there is no doubt about the involvement of Iran in the invasion. In fact, the Bible mentions Iran by name — its primordial name of Persia.
Ezekiel 38:5
“Persia, Ethiopia, and Libya with them; all of them with shield and helmet.”
You would have to read the whole of Ezekiel 38 and 39 to understand this prophecy. But note that Bible students believe that the Ethiopia referred to in Ezekiel 38:5 is the nation of Sudan. I know that Sudan is part of the Abraham Accords and has signed a normalization agreement with Israel. But prophecy must be fulfilled. I don’t wish for a military coup but all it takes for Sudan to become an enemy of Israel is a successful coup by the other faction in Sudan.
Due to the fact that the Bible uses the old names of nations, it is not immediately clear which nations God mentioned to Ezekiel when you read Ezekiel 38. But Bible students have determined through research that, apart from Russia (which leads the invasion) and Iran and Libya which are mentioned by name, and then Sudan, the other nation mentioned is Turkey.
But one of the most amazing parts of Ezekiel’s prophecy has to do with Saudi Arabia. The forefathers of the Saudis are Sheba and Dedan — the two grandsons of Cush, who was the son of Ham, who was the son of Noah. See Genesis 10:6-7.
The prophecy of Ezekiel 38 says Sheba and Dedan will criticize the invasion of Israel by the nations listed in verses 2, 5, and 6.
Ezekiel 38:13
“Sheba and Dedan . . . shall say unto thee, Art thou come to take a spoil? Hast thou gathered thy company to take a prey? to carry away silver and gold, to take away cattle and goods, to take a great spoil?
Note that cattle, silver, and gold were the measure of wealth in Bible days. These days, the wealth of nations is determined based on other parameters.
For many years, Bible students wondered how Arabs, who are natural enemies of Israel, will criticize an invasion of Israel. Then came a madman into the White House. And his name was Donald Trump. This unusual guy worked pragmatically to tame the raucous geopolitical situation in the Middle East and the result was the Abraham Accords. Now, the relationship between Israel and the Arab world (including Saudi Arabia) has changed so dramatically we no longer wonder how Ezekiel 38:13 will be fulfilled. It is now clear as crystal that, whether or not normalization occurs between Israel and Saudi Arabia, an invasion of Israel by the nations implicated in the prophecy of Ezekiel will cause a reaction from Saudi Arabia — on the side of Israel.
My point?
Prophecy is being fulfilled before our very eyes. Before Trump and before the Abraham Accords (and especially before the recent rise of Iran) Saudi Arabia was a staunch enemy of Israel and a benefactor of the Palestinians. That job has now been left for Qatar, the oil-rich Sunni nation that allies more with Shia Iran than with its fellow Sunnis. In fact, Qatar has become a thorn in the flesh of Sunni Islam nations, who accuse Qatar of supporting terrorism. But the real issue is Iran. Qatar’s population is over 90% Sunni and its closeness to Iran — the dominant Shia power on earth — must have rattled the Sunnis. Things got to a head in 2017 and this Qatar issue nearly divided the Sunni Muslim world into two, with Qatar being supported by Iran and Turkey. And Libya. And the Muslim Brotherhood. And Hamas. Apart from Iran, all the other entities that supported Qatar were Sunnis. But you need to understand the dynamics of their support and why they did not band with their Sunni brothers like Saudi Arabia and Egypt. Turkey is in competition with Saudi Arabia for leadership of the Sunni Islamic world; and Hamas is more or less the Gaza version of the Muslim Brotherhood, which is a group that has been declared illegal by several Arab governments. On its part, Saudi Arabia was supported in the impasse by Egypt, United Arab Emirates (Dubai), Bahrain, Mauritania, Niger, Gabon, the Maldives, and several other countries.
Remember that the prophecy mentions Turkey and Libya and Iran. Apart from Hamas, it is these three countries that were the main supporters of Qatar in its face off with the Saudis. That should be food for thought if you have been following my drift so far. Some people who allow themselves to be deceived by the Aljazeera news channel do not even know that the Saudis and other Arab governments consider Aljazeera such a national security threat that one of their conditions for reconciliation with Qatar was for Qatar to shut down Aljazeera, which is owned by the government of Qatar. Remember that the BBC and Aljazeera lied against Israel by blaming Israel for the rocket launched within Gaza that landed at the Al Ahli hospital and killed 30 people. Fortunately, the bare facts eventually emerged and BBC was forced to eat humble pie and apologize publicly. But the BBC was caught in another lie against Israel a few weeks later. They claimed that Israel targeted Arab doctors in their raid on the Al Shifa hospital, only to later eat humble pie again and admit that they had lied against Israel. The fact was that Israel came along for the raid of Al Shifa with Arab-speaking doctors so that these doctors could help save lives as well as facilitate communication with the patients in the hospital. What Israel meant for good was broadcast as great evil to the world and it even resulted in spontaneous protests in some Arab cities. So don’t blame the Saudis for wanting Aljazeera shut down as part of the negotiations for peace with Qatar. They have suffered from Aljazeera’s lies too — apparently.
As for the international angle, remember that the United Arab Emirates, Egypt, Jordan, Bahrain, Israel, and Saudi Arabia are beginning to see themselves as allies; while Iran, Qatar, Hamas, Turkey, Libya, and the Muslim Brotherhood are all in one basket. And the MB are good friends with former US President Barack Obama. Obama even found time out of his busy schedule as US President to host leaders of the Muslim Brotherhood at the White House. Remember that Obama’s first foreign trip after he became president in 2008 was to Egypt. He specifically gave a speech at the University of Cairo. I don’t know what type of signal Obama gave to the crowd, but the Arab Spring was the next thing that was witnessed in the Middle East. And, in Egypt, the Muslim Brotherhood was the prime beneficiary of the Arab Spring.
How so?
One of their own, Mohammed Morsi, became President of Egypt. And guess the first thing Morsi attempted to do.
Israel.
It is always about Israel.
This Muslim Brotherhood man (feared by the Saudis and most Arab governments but supported by Iran, Turkey, Libya, and having Barack Obama as Big Brother) wanted to tear up the peace treaty between Egypt and Israel that was signed in 1979. And this would have resulted in immediate war between the two countries because the primary purpose of the peace treaty is to forbid war between them — until that peace treaty is canceled. And that was what Morsi started toying with. Of course the Egyptian military simply shoved him aside and he is now history. Today, we can conveniently add the Yemeni Houthis to the side of the Qatar/Iran axis. And they have been trying to register their loyalty to Iran by sending armed drones towards Israel and even shooting ballistic missiles at Israel. Do you now understand (as I stated in an earlier article) why Saudi Arabia, Egypt and even Jordan are intercepting missiles fired from Yemen towards Israel?
Can you imagine that?
Muslim nations intercepting weapons shot by a fellow Muslim nation towards a Jewish nation.
Except you understand the role of Iran in the region, you will never understand this interesting and even intriguing development.
Remember that Ezekiel foresaw a warming of relations between Israel and the descendants of Sheba and Dedan, who are today’s Saudis. And it is happening right now. This does not mean I love the Saudis and hate the Iranians. I love the Sunnis and the Shias and all of humanity. The things I am stating are just the bare facts — without prejudice.
As for those who doubt the relevance of the Ezekiel 38 prophecy with regard to the end times, for their own sake, I will urge them to consider the evidence below, which makes it clear and incontrovertible that Ezekiel 38 is not about an old or Bible days invasion of Israel but something meant to happen at the end of the world. And the evidence is from the prophecy itself.
Ezekiel 38:16
“And thou shalt come up against my people of Israel, as a cloud to cover the land; it shall be in the latter days . . . “
Do you know what the Bible means when it uses the word “latter”?
1 Timothy 4:1
“Now the Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits, and doctrines of devils;”
Everybody knows that the prophecy above is referring to the end times.
Why?
Because when the Bible says the latter times it is surely referring to the end times. Latter means end in the Bible.
The outpouring of the Holy Spirit during Pentecost (just 10 days after Jesus Christ ascended to heaven) is often referred to as the “former rain” in the Bible and the outpouring of the Holy Spirit in the last days is referred to as the “latter rain”. Again, the reason is because latter means last or end.
A generally accepted principle in the Bible is that, when God repeats something (especially a prophecy) that thing is cast in stone — it is established.
Deuteronomy 19:15
“At the mouth of two witnesses, or at the mouth of three witnesses, shall the matter be established.”
When Joseph was interpreting the dream of Pharaoh (which Pharaoh’s servants and Pharaoh’s gods could not interpret) he told Pharaoh that, because the dream was doubled unto Pharaoh twice, the matter was established.
Genesis 41:32
“And for that the dream was doubled unto Pharaoh twice; it is because the thing is established by God, and God will shortly bring it to pass.”
In making it clear that the Ezekiel 38 invasion of the land of Israel will be in the last days, the Bible uses the word “latter” two times; and both times were in the same chapter 38. I have already quoted Ezekiel 38:16, which categorically places this war in the last days by using the word “latter”. See another use of the word “latter” in Ezekiel 38:8.
To further prove that this war is going to be after the Holocaust (during which Adolf Hitler killed millions of Jews) note the following statement in Ezekiel’s prophecy and stand in awe at the wisdom of God, never forgetting that the Book of Ezekiel was written between 595BC and 574BC. In fact, if you check the top of the margin of your King James Version of the Bible, you will see that both Ezekiel 38 and 39 were written in 587BC.
My point?
This prophecy was written at least 500 years before Jesus Christ was born. And God basically foretold the holocaust, which Satanists and enemies of the Jews now dare to deny.
For those not conversant with the term, the holocaust was Adolf Hitler’s attempt during the Second World War to wipe out all the Jews in the world.
How did God describe modern Israel to Ezekiel? Note that He refers to Israel as a land “brought back from the sword”.
Ezekiel 38:8
“After many days thou shalt be visited: in the latter years thou shalt come into the land that is brought back from the sword . . .”
This language absolutely fits the holocaust. The instrument of death in Bible days was the sword. Being brought back from the sword thus means being rescued from certain death — in the case of an individual — or being rescued from annihilation — in the case of a people or a nation. By saying that the nation of Israel will be “brought back from the sword” God, in my view, was foretelling a time during the last days when a brazen attempt will be made to kill all the Jews on earth. But they will be saved; they will be “brought back from the sword. In other words, they will survive an attempted genocide. By killing millions of Jews and continuing with the pogrom, it was clear that Hitler was intent on killing each and every Jew in the whole world. But for the allied forces that defeated the Nazis, that was what would have happened.
In the 5-Part Series I published sometime ago titled Gravity As A Weapon Of War, I provided ample evidence that Satanists have what they refer to as The Invocation, which contains what they refer to as The Great Plan. At least part of The Great Plan is to achieve the same goal Adolf Hitler attempted — wipe Jews off the face of the earth. You can choose to read the 5-Part Series I laboured to write, or do your own research. But the understanding that Satanists (who rule the world on behalf of Satan) want to eliminate the Jews before their Christ (Antichrist) shows up will open your eyes to understand what’s going on in this world and especially in the Middle East. You will finally understand why the powers that be are working behind the scenes to destroy Israel and how the existence and survival of Israel is an act of God’s direct intervention in the form of daily and I dare say hourly miracles. You will understand why all the major media organizations in the world work very hard to make you believe that Hamas is made up of very brave and highly intelligent and morally sound freedom fighters, whereas the Israelis are bullies who have a special craving for seeing the death and destruction of unarmed and innocent civilians — including women and children. You will understand why the whole world went ablaze and tried to prevent Israel from using its military might to quickly conclude the current war (by insisting on ceasefire) while refusing to get Hamas to release the hostages. You must have noticed that, in the ongoing war, while brainwashed people are shouting at Israel to ceasefire (so as to enable the continued existence of Hamas and guarantee the deaths of Israelis in the future) none of them were told that, if Hamas releases all the hostages it is currently holding, even people like me will begin to shout at Israel to ceasefire. But as long as Hamas holds onto those Israelis they kidnapped, on what basis can a moral person ask Israel to ceasefire? Yet a lot of people are doing nothing to encourage Hamas to release the abductees, while mounting pressure on Israel to ceasefire. When you get to know the agenda of Satanists, you will understand why the UN is one of the greatest enemies of Israel; why stupid lies have been invented to try to prove that the Jews are not Jews because they were scattered throughout the world during the AD70 dispersion and have lost their identity.
Tell it to the birds.
So the Jews are no longer a unique group of people with identifiable characteristics but Adolf Hitler was able to determine who a Jew was for the purpose of annihilating them?
Now that they are in the land of Israel, out of sheer embarrassment at the miraculous power of God, Satanists had to invent the lie that the people of Israel have no blood connection with father Abraham, or Isaac, or Jacob.
Again I say, tell that to the birds.
Interestingly, there is further proof in Ezekiel 38:8 that God was basically foretelling the holocaust, which, although carried out by Adolf Hitler who was the leader of Germany at the time, affected the Jews in many nations. Particularly the nations of Europe, where most of them were living.
Ezekiel 38:8
“Thou shalt come into the land that is brought back from the sword, and is gathered out of many people, against the mountains of Israel, which have been always waste; but it is brought forth out of the nations . . . “
Note: they were “brought forth out of the nations . . .”
So God did indicate that the Jews will come out of many nations after an attempt to annihilate them and that the place will be a wasteland. This is amazing because, as the famous American writer and comedian Mark Twain remarked, when he visited the area many years before the return of the Jews, it was largely a wasteland. So the prophecy is spot on and the evidence is overwhelming: the Jews will face an attempted annihilation in the last days and be rescued and then gathered out of many nations into the land of Israel. If Ezekiel 38:8 is not referring to the near annihilation of the Jews during the holocaust and the gathering of the Jews out of many nations and the eventual establishment of the State of Israel, please tell us what it is referring to.
If you believe in the Bible, it means you believe in the God of the Bible. But the God of the Bible is the God of Israel. And you are not better than the Israelis in any way. As a Christian, your salvation is because you were spiritually grafted into an olive tree that was naturally theirs. They are children of Abraham by nature and become complete when they believe in Jesus Christ. It is through the goodness of God that the merits of the death of Jesus Christ becomes available to all, making it possible for us to tap into the blessings of Abraham.
Romans 11:24
“For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature, and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree: how much more shall these, which be the natural branches, be graffed into their own olive tree?”
The Bible even warns against the idea of treating the Jews in a condescending manner.
Romans 11:17-18
“And if some of the branches be broken off, and thou, being a wild olive tree, wert graffed in among them, and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree; Boast not against the branches. But if thou boast, thou bearest not the root, but the root thee.”
If you say Israel sinned against God, are you without sin?
The fact of the matter is that you cannot accept the part of the Bible where God says He will punish the children of Israel for their rebellion or unbelief — and then proceeds to do as He says — only for you to then fall for the lies of Satanists and refuse to believe the part where God says He will do this and that for the benefit of Israel.
So it is ok for God to punish Israel and permit their dispersion and humiliation in heathen lands but it is not ok for Him to gather them back — as a way of providing evidence that He is the true God, right?
Ezekiel 39:26-28 and verse 23.
[26]After that they have borne their shame, and all their trespasses whereby they have trespassed against me, when they dwelt safely in their land, and none made them afraid.
[27]When I have brought them again from the people, and gathered them out of their enemies’ lands, and am sanctified in them in the sight of many nations;
[28]Then shall they know that I am the LORD their God, which caused them to be led into captivity among the heathen: but I have gathered them unto their own land, and have left none of them any more there.
[23]And the heathen shall know that the house of Israel went into captivity for their iniquity: because they trespassed against me, therefore hid I my face from them, and gave them into the hand of their enemies: so fell they all by the sword.
Jesus Christ wept over Jerusalem while declaring that the Jews did not know the time of their visitation.
Luke 19:41 and 44.
“And when He was come near, He beheld the city, and wept over it.
44: “. . . because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation.”
What were the things that were to happen to the Jews because of their rejection of Jesus Christ?
From Luke 19:43 and 44, these things are:
Verse 43: “. . . thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee, and compass thee round, and keep thee in on every side.”
The above is the language of a siege. Jesus Christ was essentially saying that Jerusalem will be besieged. But there was more.
Verse 44: “And shall lay thee even with the ground . . . and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another. . .”
Most Bible students will react with awareness to the phrase “”one stone upon another” because it is a language of prophecy and part of the very first sentence uttered by Jesus Christ in His most well known discourse on end time prophecy, as stated in Matthew 24.
Matthew 24:2
“And Jesus said unto them, See ye not all these things: verily I say unto you, There shall not be left here ONE STORY UPON ANOTHER, that shall not be thrown down.”
And what did Jesus Christ mean by the statement that there will be no one stone upon the other?
First of all, He was referring to the second Temple — the one built after Solomon’s Temple was destroyed by king Nebuchadnezzar. This prophecy about not one stone upon another was a very terrible prophecy — and it was completely fulfilled. Both church history and world history attest to the fact that the fulfillment took place in AD70. You can just Google “the siege of Jerusalem” and convince yourself that the words of Jesus Christ came to pass. Even the Temple He prophesied about was destroyed in the very unique way He stated. Remember He said there would not be one stone left on another.
How was that fulfilled?
During the siege of Jerusalem, the Temple was burnt to the ground. But because the gold of the Temple melted and began to drop within the cracks in the structure of the building, the Roman soldiers (in order to recover the gold) had to take out all the stones that made up the Temple building one after the other. It was because of the gold. And that was how the words of Jesus Christ were fulfilled.
It was to protect His disciples from the devastation of the invasion of Jerusalem by the Roman army that Jesus Christ gave them the sign of the abomination of desolation and told them to leave in a hurry whenever they saw that sign. In God’s providence, He ensured that Jerusalem was besieged three and a half years before the AD70 siege — so as to enable His children escape.
Matthew 24:15-16
“When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation, spoken of by Daniel the prophet, stand in the holy place, (whoso readeth, let him understand:) Then let them which be in Judea flee into the mountains.”
World history says this abomination of desolation that served as a sign for the people of God to leave Jerusalem took place sometime in AD66 — three and a half years before AD70.
How do we know that the abomination of desolation is the surrounding of Jerusalem by the Roman army in AD66?
It’s too easy and you don’t need to think about it. Because it is right there in the Bible.
Luke 21:20-21
“And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies, then know that the desolation thereof is nigh. Then let them which are in Judea flee to the mountains . . .”
When you compare the above with the parallel passage in Matthew 24:15-16, it becomes clear that the abomination of desolation is the same thing as Jerusalem being surrounded by armies — or compassed with armies, as stated by Jesus Christ in Luke 21:20.
Furthermore, in Luke’s account (Luke 21:24) Jesus Christ also gave the history of the world from AD70 until the end of human probation, using the history of the Jews as a template.
How did Jesus Christ use Jewish history to foretell human history?
Let’s state Luke 21:24 below, bearing in mind that, after the Romans destroyed both Jerusalem and the second Temple, the Jews were banished from that land and scattered throughout the world. In fact, the word, “diaspora”originally referred to the Jews living outside of Israel (as a result of this punitive dispersion that took place in AD70) and we today say Nigerians living in diaspora when we are referring to Nigerians living outside their own country.
So how did Jesus Christ tell world history from AD70 until the close of human probation, using the template of Jewish history?
Luke 21:24
“And they shall fall by the edge of the sword, and shall be led away captive into all nations: and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles, until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled.”
Jesus Christ is saying that the Jews will be led away captive into all nations from AD70 until the times of the Gentiles are fulfilled. I addressed the issue of the times of the Gentiles in details in an earlier article but must now give a brief explanation to guide those who have never known about this or read my earlier article.
Within the prophecy of Daniel 9, God allotted 490 years to the Jews. It was a period of probation. And it was what Jesus Christ was referring to in Mark 1:15 when He began to preach to the Jews saying “the time is fulfilled.”
What time?
It is the 483 years (or 69 weeks) Daniel said it would take from the giving of a certain decree until the anointing of Jesus Christ, Who was referred to as the Messiah. The 69 weeks were referred to as seven weeks and three score and two weeks. And one day is equal to a year in this prophecy, making the 69 weeks equivalent to 483 years.
Daniel 9:25
“Know therefore and understand, that from the going forth of the commandment to restore and to build Jerusalem unto the Messiah the Prince shall be seven weeks, and threescore and two weeks . . .”
Jesus Christ was anointed during His baptism 483 years after the decree to restore and rebuild Jerusalem, given in 457BC by king Artaxerxes. But the probation of the Jews was to last for 490 years, meaning that, from the baptism of Jesus Christ (same time as His anointing by the Holy Spirit) the Jews still had seven more years of probationary time. The ministry of Jesus Christ lasted approximately three and a half years and He died, rose again, and went to heaven, leaving the Jews with another three and a half years during which the gospel was exclusively preached to them. Some Christians have no idea that the preaching of Jesus Christ was exclusively for the Jews. Even His disciples were commanded to preach to none other but the “lost sheep of the house of Israel.” Any other person outside the Jewish community that got anything from Christ did so by violent faith. But that is a topic for another day.
Matthew 10:5-6
[5]These twelve Jesus sent forth, and commanded them, saying, Go not into the way of the Gentiles, and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not:
[6]But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel.
Why did Jesus Christ focus His ministry exclusively on the Jews?
It was because their 490 years of probation (or the times of the Jews)!was still active during His ministry and until that 490 years ended with the stoning of Stephen three and a half years after the ministry of Christ ended, the Jews remained the exclusive beneficiaries of the gospel. If you will recall, it was after the stoning of Stephen that the gospel began to be taken to the Gentiles. But these things were explained in the series titled The Greatest Deception In Modern Christianity, which is available on request.
While the Jews tried to cope in the nations they had been scattered to after the AD70 dispersion, no one in his sane mind would have believed that there would ever be a nation of Israel in this world again. But the prophecy of Jesus Christ in Luke 21:24 said Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles, until . . .
Until when?
Just like the time of the Jews was fulfilled, Jerusalem was to be trodden down of the Gentiles until the times of the Gentiles is fulfilled. From the perspective of the Bible, the human family is divided into two groups — namely Jews and Gentiles. As far as the Bible is concerned, you are either a Jew or a Gentile. That means if you are not a Jew, you are a Gentile. And the prophecy of Jesus Christ in Luke 21:24 was not referring to spiritual Jews. I understand that Christians are spiritual Jews. But the prophecy of Jesus Christ was referring to the physical blood-of-father-Abraham type of Jews. In fact, the prophecy was about their punishment, primarily for rejecting Jesus Christ. And that prophecy says Jerusalem shall continually be trodden down of the Gentiles (non-Jews) until the times of these Gentiles are fulfilled. If this means anything, it means that, by the time the times of the Gentiles are fulfilled, Jerusalem would no longer be under the control of the Gentiles. And since the human family is either Jew or Gentile, it means Jerusalem would be under the control of the Jews when the times of the Gentiles are fulfilled.
If Jew plus Gentile is equal to all of humanity, then it means that the end of the times of the Gentiles is also the end of human probation since the Jews already had their 490 years of probation from 457BC to AD34 when Deacon Stephen was stoned and when the gospel began to be preached to the whole of humanity — and no longer to the Jews alone, as Jesus Christ commanded in Matthew 10:5-6.
The day you see the Jews in charge of Jerusalem, you can be sure that, based on the prophecy of Jesus Christ in Luke 21:24, human probation has ended. That means you can sense the nearness of the end of human probation by considering how close the Jews are to taking complete control of Jerusalem. Note that, when modern Israel was established in 1948, the Israelis did not have control over any part of Jerusalem. It was the 1967 Six-Day War that enabled them to take control of some portion of Jerusalem.
What if another war big enough to warrant their complete take over of Jerusalem takes place?
You think they will be reluctant to do so?
Prophecy must be fulfilled.
And this particular prophecy is apparently having a staggered fulfillment.
In 1948, Ezekiel 38:8 was fulfilled: the Jews were “brought back from the sword” and “brought forth from many nations” into the land of Israel that was “always waste”.
Then, in 1967, during the six-day war, they took possession of a part of Jerusalem, partly fulfilling the conditions for the fulfillment of the times of the Gentiles.
I am thoroughly convinced that the Ezekiel 38 war (which ends with the blistering defeat of the enemies of Israel by direct divine intervention) will provide the Israelis a credible opportunity to completely take over Jerusalem and bring the prophecy of Luke 21:24 to fulfillment. This is why I believe that the Ezekiel 38 war will end with the close of human probation — when the Jews assume complete control of Jerusalem. It is not an abstract belief. It is based on my belief in the words of Jesus Christ. And that explains my interest in what is going on in the Middle East.
Some enemies of the Bible and of the God of the Bible say some ridiculous things — below their level of intelligence — all in a bid to neutralize the providence of God in the history of modern Israel. They say something like: “the establishment of the State of Israel was all part of the plan of the Illuminati to achieve some of their goals”. I honestly think that is a crooked lie because I have come to understand that there is no lie too base for satanists to tell out of fear that rational people can start from the history of Israel and discover the true God. But even if you accepted the theory that the Illuminati/New World Order crowd somehow played a role in the establishment of modern Israel and that it was for a sinister agenda.
So what?
Does Bible prophecy necessarily require the cooperation of godly people for its fulfillment? Does God not use people in their evil machinations to still fulfill His will? The people that killed Jesus Christ; did they not have their nefarious agenda? But did that negate the fact that they were but fulfilling prophecy in spite of themselves? Did king Nebuchadnezzar not have his own agenda in invading Israel in 606BC? So if it can be proven that king Nebuchadnezzar had an evil agenda in invading Israel, that now invalidates the prophecy of Jeremiah that said he will invade and burn Jerusalem to the ground?
The enemies of God know not that they make fools of themselves when they manifest desperation in trying to neutralize God’s glory in His workings in the destiny of nations. Whether by the agenda of the Illuminati or by the political calculation of the diplomats at the United Nations at the time, when the time came, Israel was reestablished — according to Bible prophecy.
Another irritating thing some people do — not realizing that they are repeating ideas generated by Satanists — is to say that the Jews are as sinful as other people and not righteous in any particular way. In fact, these people are reluctant to believe any prophecy concerning modern Israel because, to them, any prophecy about modern Israel means you are insinuating that the Jews are a righteous people. There is no limit to the harm Satan can cause if he can hide the truth of the Bible from you. Please read the Bible and learn how God works. The end time prophecy about the workings of God on behalf of Israel does not require their righteousness. It is all about the purpose of God.
Ezekiel 36:22-23
[22]Therefore say unto the house of Israel, Thus saith the Lord GOD; I do not this for your sakes, O house of Israel, but for mine holy name’s sake, which ye have profaned among the heathen, whither ye went.
[23]And I will sanctify my great name, which was profaned among the heathen, which ye have profaned in the midst of them; and the heathen shall know that I am the LORD, saith the Lord GOD, when I shall be sanctified in you before their eyes.
